snippet.title: Min-Mins goes mobile!
snippet.description:
Build your army of min-mins and prepare for combat in the clouds.

Min-Mins is a turn-based casual strategy game for Android and iOS. Assemble your team and search for your opponents in the clouds. Using the training arenas to discover winning strategies and battle other teams in live PvP matches.

Min-Mins is integrated with the blockchain using Enjin. Unlock new powerful teams and collect tokens using the Enjin Wallet. Although using the blockchain is optional, it enhances the experience by allowing ownership of items and rewards.
